name: Bobbys Warehouse
description:
WebGL version works bad in Chrome, use Firefox, Internet Explorer or any other kind of browser or download the standalone version!


Controls:

WASD / Arrow keys: Move

Spacebar: Pick up / drop boxes

Should work with a controller, if the WebGL version doesn't work there is a downloadable file as well!

Hope you enjoy the game!

Help bobby ship boxes and manage his space in his warehouse!

Move the boxes before their timers run out, you can lose 5 boxes, after that it's Game Over! Try to get your score as high as possible!

Tools used:

Unity

Audacity

Fruity Loops

Photoshop

sfxr

Sewing machine (track sounds)

The font is from dafont.com :

https://www.dafont.com/bd-cartoon-shout.font?l[]=10&l[]=1

Made for Ludum Dare 42 by Johannes Fornaeus
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/bobbys-warehouse
